collection:
Your data

To provide you with the services of AI Endurance we collect the following
information with your consent:

\- Your email address, name and login details that you provide when
registering.

\- Data that you directly input into AI Endurance related to you exercise
regime.

\- Activity data from Garmin, Strava and Suunto that you authorise AI
Endurance to import.

Google Analytics

Your visits to AI Endurance and the pages that you view are tracked in an
anonymised fashion using Google Analytics.
sharing:
Use of your email address

We will not share your email address with third parties.
